string.name: currentlyStreaming
string.comment: %s is the title of the stream, chosen by the streamer.

string.name: lastStream
string.comment: %s is how long ago the stream was in relative time (e.g. 50 minutes ago). It is displayed in smaller type than the rest of the string.

resources.string: An bhfuil cuntas Twitch nó YouTube agat?
Cuir an eochairfhocal \"lichess.org\" san áireamh i do theideal srutha agus bain úsáid as an gcatagóir \"Ficheall\" nuair a dhéanann tú sruth ar Lichess.
Bain an eochair-fhocal nuair atá tú ag sruthlú stuif neamh-Lichess.
Braithfidh Lichess do shruth go huathoibríoch agus ligfidh sé na buntáistí seo a leanas:

string.name: rule4
string.comment: the resulting message is: Read our streaming Fairplay FAQ to ensure a fair play for everyone in your stream

resources.string: Léigh ár %s chun cothrom na Féinne a chinntiú do gach duine le linn do shruth.
cCanna maidir le cothrom na Féinne a shruthlú
Buntáistí a bhaineann le sruthú leis an eochairfhocal
Faigh deilbhín sraoilleán lasrach ar do phróifíl Lichess.
Teigh suas go barr an liosta sruthlaithe.
Cuir in iúl do do leanúna Lichess.
Taispeáin do shruth i do chluichí, comórtais agus staidéir.
Tá modhnóirí ag athbhreithniú ar do shruth.
Líon isteach d’eolais sruthaithe le do thoil, agus uaslódáil pictiúr.
Nuair atá tú réidh le liostáil mar sruthú Lichess, %s

string.name: requestReview
string.comment:
requestReview
Used as part of the longer sentence: "When you are ready to be listed as a Lichess streamer, request a moderator review"

resources.string: Díríonn leathanach sruthlóra Lichess ar do lucht féachana leis an teanga a sholáthraíonn d’ardán sruthú. Socraigh an teanga réamhshocraithe cheart do do shruthanna fichille san aip nó seirbhís a úsáideann tú chun craoladh.

string.name: twitchUsername
string.comment:
Appears on the form for setting up your Streamer page: https://lichess.org/streamer/edit
Twitch is a proper noun and refers to the streaming service https://twitch.tv/. Please do not translate the word 'Twitch'.

resources.string: Roghnach. Fág folamh mura bhfuil ceann ann
Le feiceáil ar an leathanach sruthú
Nuair atá siad faofa ó modhnóirí
Inis dúinn faoi do shruth in aon abairt amháin
